examples: We had dinner with our director and his charming wife.

definitions.definition: used to describe people who use their attractiveness to influence people or to make other people like them:
examples: He's very charming but I wouldn't trust him.

definitions.definition: used to show that you do not approve of what someone has said or done:
examples: "Shut up, will you, I'm trying to watch TV!" "Oh, charming!"
